subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Shannon Boxx scored on a looping header in the 77th minute Sunday to lift the United States to a 1-0 win over host China at the Four Nations Tournament in Guangzhou. Hope Solo, briefly dismissed from the United States team for criticizing the former coach’s decision to bench her during the World Cup, started in goal for the second time in the tournament and had one save.
